definitions.definition: Of a person : speaking , or versed in, many languages ; multilingual .
Containing , or made up of, several languages; specifically, of a book (especially a bible ): having text translated into several languages.
examples: a polyglot bible    a polyglot lexicon

definitions.definition: Comprising various ( native ) linguistic groups ; multilingual.
examples: A polyglot region without a clearly dominant culture may develop an artificial lingua franca, such as Pidgin English in the South Sea.

main_definition: Of a person : speaking , or versed in, many languages ; multilingual .
secondary_definitions: Containing , or made up of, several languages; specifically, of a book (especially a bible ): having text translated into several languages.
Comprising various ( native ) linguistic groups ; multilingual.
